skill.name: domain-name-brainstormer
skill.description: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, etc.). Saves hours of brainstorming and manual checking.
skill.summary: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs (...
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-only skill containing no executable code. The SKILL.md file contains only documentation and prompt templates for generating domain name ideas. No scripts, network calls, filesystem access, environment variable access, or external command execution capabilities are present.

content.value_statement: Finding the perfect domain name takes hours of brainstorming and manual checking across multiple registrars. This skill generates relevant domain name ideas tailored to your project and checks availability across popular TLDs like .com, .io, .dev, and .ai.
actual_capabilities: Analyze your project description and target audience
Generate creative and brandable domain name suggestions
Provide branding insights explaining why certain names work well
Suggest alternatives when top choices are taken
Offer domain naming tips and TLD guidance
limitations: Does not actually register domains or interact with registrars
Cannot verify trademark conflicts or legal availability
Cannot check social media handle availability
Does not provide pricing beyond general estimates

use_cases.title: Launch a New Startup
use_cases.description: Get domain name suggestions for your startup idea and find available options across business-friendly TLDs.

use_cases.title: Name Your Project
use_cases.description: Find the perfect domain for your developer tool, open source project, or code-sharing platform.

use_cases.title: Build Your Personal Brand
use_cases.description: Discover domain name options for your personal portfolio, blog, or professional brand.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Project Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Suggest domain names for my [project type] that helps [target audience] with [key feature].

prompt_templates.title: Specific TLD Preference
prompt_templates.prompt: I need a domain name for my [project description]. Prefer short names with [.ai or .io] extension.

prompt_templates.title: Keyword-Based Search
prompt_templates.prompt: Suggest domain names using the words [keyword1] or [keyword2] for my [business type].

prompt_templates.title: Competitor Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me domain patterns used by successful [industry] tools, then suggest similar available ones.

output_examples.input: I'm building a tool for developers to share code snippets. Suggest creative domain names.
output: Top Pick: snippet.dev - Short, memorable, .dev adds credibility

best_practices: Act fast when you find a good domain since quality names get taken quickly
Register multiple TLD variations to protect your brand
Say the name out loud to verify it is easy to pronounce and spell
anti_patterns: Using hyphens or numbers that make domains hard to communicate verbally
Choosing overly long names that are difficult to remember
Selecting names that could have negative connotations in other languages

faq.question: Does this skill actually register domains?
faq.answer: No, this skill generates suggestions and checks availability status but does not interact with registrars.

faq.question: How many TLDs does it check?
faq.answer: The skill checks .com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app, .eco, .fashion, and other popular extensions.

faq.question: Can I use this for trademark checking?
faq.answer: The skill provides general guidance only. You should conduct official trademark research separately.

faq.question: Is my project information kept private?
faq.answer: Yes, all prompts and project details remain local to your AI conversation.

faq.question: What if my first choice is taken?
faq.answer: The skill automatically suggests variations and alternatives when top choices are unavailable.

faq.question: How is this different from other domain tools?
faq.answer: This skill combines creative brainstorming with AI understanding of your project context for tailored suggestions.
